name: upload-image-cloudflare-obsidian
description: 在粘贴图片时自动上传到 Cloudflare R2，并插入 Markdown 链接。

scripts.test: TARGET="/Users/zhongwei4/Documents/Obsidian Vault/.obsidian/plugins/upload-image-cloudflare-obsidian"; mkdir -p "$TARGET" && cp -f main.js manifest.json styles.css versions.json "$TARGET" && echo "Copied files to $TARGET"
